titles.title: A bill to require the Government Accountability Office to study the role pharmaceutical benefit managers play in the pharmaceutical supply chain and provide Congress with appropriate policy recommendations, and for other purposes.
Pharmacy Benefit Manager Accountability Study Act of 2019
